titles.title: Twentieth Sunday in Ordinary Time - Year C

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord,
make haste to help me!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I waited,
I waited for the Lord,
and he stooped down to me;
he heard my cry.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He drew me
from the deadly pit,
from the miry clay.
He set my feet upon a rock,
made my footsteps firm.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He put a new song
into my mouth,
praise of our God.
Many shall see and fear
and shall trust in the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Wretched and poor though I am,
the Lord is mindful of me.
You are my rescuer, my help;
O my God, do not delay.
